meanings.sent1: She dupped her friend into thinking the toy was broken.
meanings.sent2: The magician dupped the audience with his disappearing act.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat dupped the dog by hiding its favorite toy.
meanings.sent4: The con artist dupped the old man out of his life savings.
meanings.sent5: The clever fox dupped the farmer by pretending to be injured.

meanings.sent1: He dupped the key to his house in case he lost the original.
meanings.sent2: The artist dupped her painting to sell multiple copies.
meanings.sent3: The student dupped his homework to give to his friend.
meanings.sent4: The machine dupped the document quickly and efficiently.
meanings.sent5: The company dupped the product to meet the high demand.
